Stuff Your Kindle! One DaY Only!


This list is for the Amazon store and the books should be free to “buy”, but please double check the price before one-clicking. If you are new to reading in the Kindle app, check out our blog post on the difference between borrowing a book inside Kindle Unlimited and buying the ebook to keep it forever!

If you prefer to read ebooks on another platform, we have pages for some of the same free deals at the following retailers as well: Google Play, Apple Books, Barnes & Noble Nook, or Kobo.

If you are looking for a specific trope, you can use Control +F (or Command + F on a Mac) to search for words you like! Otherwise, click on a category below and start stuffing! This is the biggest list of free books we’ve compiled to date, so it might take a hot second to load the whole page. If something isn’t working as expected, you can refresh this webpage to load all the data (and you should only have to do that once, then it’ll be in your computer’s memory properly - oh, and we really do recommend browsing through these on a computer, not a phone!)

PLEASE CHECK ALL PRICES BEFORE YOU ONE-CLICK! Many of Amazon’s free offerings depend on their database price-matching system, and the prices sometimes revert to their “regular price”. If a book is not free, put it on your wish list, and Amazon will notify you when the price drops again. This price-matching dropping is more common in Canada and Australia, and with this many free books, it's impossible for us to monitor free status in all territories. Thank you for your understanding! And stuff that wish list, or check out our page of Kobo free listings, which is more reliable for some international readers!

And for our readers in India: we have included direct India links for all books on this list, but some might not be be available to you based on publishing rights or category restrictions. We apologize for any broken links you might encounter. This list is maintained by one person and it's not possible to check all 2000 titles.

CATEGORIES

We have books in every category, follow these links to jump to your preferred section, or scroll through and browse in every category. (In order to jump to these categories, the whole page needs to be loaded! Welcome to the biggest Stuff Your Kindle event ever! If they don’t seem to go anywhere just yet, wait a minute, or hit refresh to load this page again)

Jump to: Young Adult, Mystery with Romantic Elements, Historical Romance, Romantic Suspense SFF Romance categories: Fantasy Romance, Urban Fantasy, Paranormal Romance, Sci-Fi Romance, Contemporary Romance categories: New Adult & Rom Com books, Women’s Fiction and Chick Lit, Sweet Contemporary Romance, Steamy Contemporary Romance, and Erotic Romance. 

Also check out our featured lists of books from the above categories… We have specific lists for books written by BIPOC Authors (Black, Indigenous, and People of Colour) with BIPOC Protagonists, books with LGBTQ+ Protagonists, and books written by disabled and neurodiverse authors.

Paranormal Romance

Sins of the Father by Mary E. Twomey
Arlanna’s life quickly turns upside-down when her father, the feared and revered mafia boss, finally gets caught in one of his many schemes and elects to send her to prison in his stead.
Keywords: mafia romance
GET Sins of the Father FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Fatal Illusion [Fatal Fae Book One] by Tameri Etherton
She's a faerie. He’s an elf. She’s an assassin. He’s a thief. The fate of Faerie and the human realm rests on them getting along. We’re so screwed.
Keywords: Fantasy Romance, Paranormal Romance, Steamy, Enemies to Lovers, Hidden Identity, Cursed Prince
GET Fatal Illusion [Fatal Fae Book One] FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
WitchBlood by Lissa Kasey
About a contrary kitsune fox who happens to be mated to the most patient werewolf in the world while battling real demons and emotional ones at the same time. Lots of tea, pastries, gardening, wolf taming, sweet and spicy romance, and a dark backstory driving fated mates together.
Keywords: m/m shifter/fae romance, contemporary setting, isekai
GET WitchBlood FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Princess Claimed (Her Psycho Vampire Bodyguards Book 1) by Mara Leigh
After a hundred years, sequestered as a virgin in the vampiric palace, all Princess Anastasia wants is her freedom, but when a diplomatic meeting goes horribly wrong, she’s taken by four massive vampires, hired killers with a code, who think it’s their duty to protect her. Long supressed passion erupts inside Ana, but she’s with these men under false pretenses, and outside their lair, danger awaits in the form of an old foe, Rasputin.
Keywords: Reverse Harem, Vampires, Very Steamy, Alpha Heroes, Royalty
GET Princess Claimed (Her Psycho Vampire Bodyguards Book 1) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Spooning My Chuchunya by Marilyn Barr
Caught between the rituals of the clan and the willful spirit of his soulmate, Sergei must choose the order which keeps him stable or his chance at fated mates. Will Sydney recognize he’s betraying his kin to win her heart or ignore their bond in fear of losing her independence?
Keywords: monster romance, knotting, primal play, snow monster
GET Spooning My Chuchunya FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Rogue Alpha (Wild Lake Wolves Series) by Kimber White
Exiled alpha wolf shifter Mal has found his fated mate in college student Laura. Though one touch made her crave him, the pull of fate could be their undoing as a rival pack wants to claim Laura for their own.
Keywords: wolf shifter, fated mates, protective alpha wolf, pack dynamics, high heat, steamy,
GET Rogue Alpha (Wild Lake Wolves Series) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Silver Under the Moonlight by Lisa Wood
A young woman, cast out by her family. A man, desperate to find his mate. Will they find their forever in each other?
Keywords: Paranormal romance, wolf shifter, fated mates
GET Silver Under the Moonlight FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Tropical Tiger Spy (Shifting Sands Resort) by Zoe Chant and Elva Birch
A tiger shifter named Tony (he’s greeeeeaaaaat!) goes undercover at a tropical resort to find out why shifters are going missing...and meets his fated mate. Will she be the next victim? The start of a complete ten-book series full of humor and heart!
Keywords: Fated mates, shifters, luxury resort setting, danger, adventure, kidnapping, found family, HEA.
GET Tropical Tiger Spy (Shifting Sands Resort) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Goldilocks and The Three Gobelins by Dakota Cockaday
Lori grew up dirt poor. So when her brother's family falls on hard times, she secretly adds another job to her already chaotic schedule and starts a stint as an exotic dancer at a popular place run by the very type of people she despises--werewolves. But when a fight with a werewolf at the club leads to her getting involved with a hot, not quite human single dad, will she be able to balance it all or will she have to sacrifice her dreams for her family?
Keywords: monster romance, fated mates, single dad romance, instalove
GET Goldilocks and The Three Gobelins FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Hell's Belle (Demon Queen, Book 1) by Eve Newton
A Queen. Seven mates; a father to rescue; a brother who betrays. Hell just got a new ruler, and it’s going to be a wild ride.
Keywords: reverse harem, m/m, f/f, demon romance
GET Hell's Belle (Demon Queen, Book 1) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Clouded By Envy (Cruel Curses) by Candace Robinson
He only ever wanted to be human. She only ever wanted to save him. Sometimes the very thing you wish for, is your undoing...
Keywords: Fae romance, vampire romance, enemies to lovers, found family
GET Clouded By Envy (Cruel Curses) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
A Catamount Christmas by J.H. Croix
If you like smoking hot paranormal romance with a twist of suspense and adventure, you’ll love this second chance holiday romance!
Keywords: paranormal shifter holiday romance
GET A Catamount Christmas FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
The Beast King's Heir (Of Lions and Roses) by Tasha Creed
The curse has been broken, and for Kas and Isabella, happily ever after is on the horizon until it rudely taken away. The village is in turmoil, Gus has never been found, and everything that should be right has gone terribly wrong. Now, Kas's father has told him he isn't truly king because of a family tradition.
Keywords: just kisses, fairytale retelling, epic fantasy
GET The Beast King's Heir (Of Lions and Roses) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Monsters Awakened by Kyla Quinn
I’ve woken the Dark, and they’re here to claim me. These dark lovers from my dreams are all I’ve ever wanted or needed. Without them I won't survive my stay at Briargrove House.
Keywords: monster romance, reverse harem, slow burn, hurt/comfort, touch her and you die, possessive MMCs, voyeurism, gothic, monster 'extras', complete duet
GET Monsters Awakened FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
For the Love of a Bear [For the Love of a Shifter Book 2] by Sunny Mawson
Sergey Patrushev will stop at nothing to save his mate and claim, but Calla Stirling has other ideas and so does life. With the kidnapping of her new best friend, Calla shuts down as the danger ramps up. Sergey takes her back to his home in the hopes that his mate will be safe, unfortunately home isn't always the safest place and he must fight to protect and claim her, heart and soul.
Keywords: Fated Mates, Bear Shifter, Wolf Shifter, Alpha
GET For the Love of a Bear [For the Love of a Shifter Book 2] FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Omega on the Run by MM Farmer
The only thing worse than being the son of The RV King of Barrington is having my father hire an ESA for my heats because he doesn’t trust any alphas around me. But I liked Benny from the moment I met him, even though he’s not my usual ESA, and he just might be my ticket out of the mess my life has become…whether he knows it or not.
Keywords: non-shifter omegaverse, mpreg, desperate times call for desperate measures, tons of smokin' hot heat schmex! Will give you all the feels.
GET Omega on the Run FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
License to Bite (New Orleans Nocturnes Book 1) by Carrie Pulkinen
All I wanted was to have the time of my life with my bestie at Mardi Gras, but you know what they say… It's all fun and games until someone wakes up dead...umm...undead.

Now we join her on her Heated journey to finally find the pack she deserves.

Keywords: Fated mates, FMC over 18, academy, Professor/student, MM, virgin fmc, rejected mates, bullying outside harem, kink, bdsm, mystery, mean girls, lust at first sight, evil parents, naive FMC, mixed shifters, lots of puns

But the snowy mountains held more than just memories, and Dixon discovered that he had left more than just his mate.

Hailey Scott keeps her heart firmly guarded. Left shy and sensitive from years of verbal abuse by her father, she finds it hard to trust men and has to fight the overwhelming urge to flee. Hailey spends her days working as a barista in her best friend’s cafe tucked away in the small North Carolina town of Beaufort. But everything she knows is about to change the moment Eric Carter walks into her life. He shows her the true meaning of love and, for once, Hailey’s tempted to stay. I place my life, and body under their protection without hesitation, as we were inseparable as Threesies in our childhood, but what will be our fate once this is over?
Keywords: MMF romance, Childhood friends, spicy romance

Damned If You Don't (Bianachi Mafia - Dark Romance) by Lovelyn Bleu
What the hell does a notorious hitman like me need with a hard-headed, venom-mouthed, spoiled ex-princess whose mafia father left her homeless and penniless? Not a damned thing, but I'll let her try to convince me otherwise, since she doesn't have a choice. She's trying hard to engage my heart, but little does she know...I don't have one.
Keywords: Dark romance, mafia romance, Duet stand alone but works better with book 1 read first, triggers listed before story starts in book
GET Damned If You Don't (Bianachi Mafia - Dark Romance) FOR FREE ON KINDLE: Amazon US | Amazon UK | Amazon Canada | Amazon Australia | Amazon India
Sable's Santa Daddy (Clover City Littles Book 2) by Honey Meyer
No one makes a Little's Christmas wish come true like a Santa daddy... Sable’s Santa Daddy features a stern and devoted daddy who wants to give his little miss what’s really important in life, and a poor little rich girl who’s in need of a particular kind of Santa to make all her Christmas wishes come true.
Keywords: DDlg romance, daddy kink, age gap romance, holiday romance, Christmas romance, spanking romance

She assumed he was just another client—but this vicious mafia billionaire doesn't just play the game. He makes the rules.

Space Army Recruits: Day 1 by Kinley Grey
When Rory overhears a space army instructor talking about the recruits’ unusual Day 30 challenge, he’s ready and willing to do whatever it takes with his seven new bunkmates to earn his place in an SDF platoon. Because this sexy small town boy will get down and dirty with women and men—kinky, public, Space Army banging—before he’ll go back to the farm!
Keywords: Scifi romance, oh-no-guess-I'm-an-exhibitionist-now, found family, we're all queer and/or kinky, right?

Into the Fire by Cynthia Dane & Hildred Billings
When former Marine Mitch arranges a one-month affair with a reclusive billionaire, she has no idea that she's about to meet the love of her life. Neither does Vanessa, a woman who has been in hiding for years, know that the true terror lurks within her walls. Together, they must embrace a new kind of love - and triumph.
Keywords: lesbian, sapphic, billionaire, suspense, wlw, age gap, bdsm, kink

First in series. Cliffhanger. In order to save my father, I have to seduce Mafia leader Cato Marino. Not only do I have to get into his bed, but also his heart. But if he discovers my affection is false...he'll kill me.
Keywords: Mafia Romance, Enemies-To-Lovers, Alpha Male, Surprise Baby, First-In-Series, Cliffhanger.

Madness (A Vancini Mafia Dark Romance) by Jayla Talbot
A psycho Mafia boss sets his sights on a waitress in his strip club. But what lengths will he go to when his little dove wants nothing to do with him or his world? Note: 'Madness' is a dark romance and will not be to everyone's liking. Please check the author's note for content warnings.

Above the Shop by Chloe Maine
I have seventeen dollars to my name and a one-way bus ticket to my new college town—two months early. Oh, and the name of a man I’ve never met scrawled on a piece of paper. Henry Wilde, who owns the barbershop in Conception Ridge...my new guardian for the summer.
Keywords: age gap, Daddy kink, guardian/ward, off-limits, slow burn, spicy small town
